name: Fei Duanmu VS Kobayashi 端木斐 VS 小林正雪
name_original: Fei Duanmu VS Kobayashi 端木斐 VS 小林正雪
description:
OUTLINESThe game is currently in the production. It’s expected to be launched in 2018.
The first attempt to integrate two different detective games in China.
A detective story with Kobayashi from mobile terminal and Fei Duanmu from PC terminal.
The exciting and intense game experience at Kowloon Walled City, a famous zone within nobody’s jurisdiction.
What will happen to two roles with distinct characters?FEATURES
  • The story originates from what really happened at Kowloon Walled City.
  • The story originates from what really happened at Kowloon Walled City.
  • Full voice
  • The integration of two different work systems.
  • Animated character sprites.
